qas.question: What natives comprise a very small percentage of the population?
Who left the country after Guinea-Bissau gained independence?

What is the ancestry of the Chinese population in Guinea-Bissau?

context: <a0_0>Portuguese<a0_0/> natives comprise a very small percentage of Guinea-Bissauans. After Guinea-Bissau gained independence, most of the <a1_0>Portuguese nationals<a1_0/> left the country. The country has a tiny <a2_0>Chinese<a2_0/> population. These include traders and merchants of <a4_0>mixed Portuguese and Chinese ancestry<a4_0/> from <a3_0>Macau<a3_0/>, a former Asian Portuguese colony.
